```{css}
/* === ESTILOS PRINCIPALES === */
/* Eliminar scroll interno */
body {
  overflow-x: hidden;
}

.dashboard {
  overflow-y: auto;
}

.cell {
  overflow: visible !important;
  height: auto !important;
  padding: 15px 0;
}

/* Contenedores de salida */
.cell-output-display {
  max-height: none !important;
  overflow: visible !important;
}

/* Im√°genes */
.cell-output-display img {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
  display: block;
  margin: 0 auto;
}

/* Mapas interactivos */
.cell-output-display iframe {
  width: 100% !important;
  height: 650px;  /* Altura fija para los mapas */
  border: none;
  margin: 15px 0;
}

/* === ESTILOS EXISTENTES MEJORADOS === */
.navbar {
  background: rgb(251,235,207) !important;
  border-bottom: 3px solid #413224 !important;
  padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
}

.navbar-brand::after {
  content: "VOLCANA";
  font-family: 'Hippo Letto', sans-serif;
  color: #413224;
  font-size: 1.8rem;
  letter-spacing: 1px;
  margin-left: 10px;
  display: inline-block;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

.navbar-brand img {
  height: 50px;
  margin-right: 10px;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
```
